thread.title: Jet2CityBreaks Celebrates New York Style!Travelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Jet2CityBreaks Celebrates New York Style!Travelandtourworld.com
text:
Jet2CityBreaks Celebrates New York Style!  
To celebrate its biggest and best ever choice of New York breaks, Jet2CityBreaks brought a taste of the city that never sleeps to the streets of Glasgow today, surprising shoppers and workers with FREE hot dogs!
The hot dog cart did a brisk trade this lunchtime as hungry passers-by enjoyed scrumptious NYC style snacks and some selfie action with the vendor and Jet2CityBreaks team.
A choice of THREE fantastic trips direct to New York from Glasgow Airport are still available for the next couple of months. Departures are scheduled as follows:
11th October 2015 for 4 nights – NEW half term trip.
20th November 2015 for 3 nights.
26th November 2015 for 4 nights – Black Friday trip.
 
Steve Heapy, CEO of Jet2.com and Jet2holidays said: “We’re gearing up for our biggest ever programme of trips so what better way to celebrate than by treating people to a tasty bite of the Big Apple with our special hot dog cart. Our New York trips are always very popular and are perfectly timed so people can experience some of the most iconic events in the city, including the infamous Black Friday!
“There are still some places on our Glasgow trips up for grabs so I’d urge anyone who wants to treat themselves and their friends and family to the ultimate city break to get booking today!”
Gary Stephen from East Kilbride who stopped by the cart with his two-year-old son Angus, said: “It’s great to see flights from Glasgow to New York meaning we can travel there right from our doorstep. Angus enjoyed his hot dog and we’ll look forward to taking him to the Big Apple when he’s a little bit older!”
 
Source:- Jet2CityBreaks
